alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 22 at 2:10PM AKST until December 25 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 AM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Blowing snow will reduce visibility and cause snow drifts to form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 60 mph will develop tonight and continue into Saturday. Winds are expected to increase dramatically Saturday night and could gust up to 80 mph from late Saturday night into Sunday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp
